name: Cosemble
tag_list: cosemble, ecommerce, social-media, events, ticketing, registration, planning
description: Create and share events with people.
overview:
Cosemble is the best way to create events and share experiences with the people and organizations you care about.

Cosemble is a self-service publishing platform that enables event organizers to easily create an event page, invite people, and sell tickets + connect with attendees online and build a following with them, amplifying promotion and distribution of events via user generated social sharing and curation. Attendees benefit from using Cosemble because they can connect online with the people they meet at events, and discover new events by following people.

Cosemble makes it easy to create and sell tickets to any type of event. Itâ€™s FREE for free events. Or you can create PAID events and earn money and happiness by bringing people together through events and social experiences.
